name: xplor-nih

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
XPLOR-NIH is a structure determination program. Note: A manual download
is required for XPLOR-NIH. Spack will search your current directory for
the download file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that
Spack can find it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
